name: Don't Fall OFF!
description:
This is a simple physics-based game in which you have no control over your speed and absolutely NEED to get to the finish.

This game was made in about 20 hours by a team of one and is extremely unpolished (but really fun!)  Expect anger and frustration.This is more of a demo than a fully fledged game. If support is positive or constructive, I will gladly make this into a polished and playable game (with more levels.)
